Comments: this was for prophylactic prevention of UTIs for my daughter with a surgically enlarged bladder. administered 10cc - 20cc via ostomy into bladder nightly...not oral or intraveinus.  my daughter took this med for 2 years. no side effects_ and even though it's not effective against some bacterial infections and she did get some infections_ she did not get bad ones. i would recommend this.
Drug Name: Gentamicin sulfate in sodium chloride 0.9% in plastic container
